name: your-project-name
description: AGG.homes Static Landing Page This is a fully static website for AGG.homes real estate agency, built with vanilla HTML5, CSS3 (Flexbox/Grid), and JavaScript. Designed for easy hosting on GitHub Pages. Includes hero banner, featured listings (with Unsplash placeholders), about us, testimonials, contact form (via Formspree), and footer with Google Maps embed. Project Structure
